name: Crayon Maze
description:
Crayon Maze is a skill building maze game and letter maze tracing game designed for primarily for toddlers, preschool and kindergarten children, but fun for kids of all ages. Younger children will enjoy learning their ABC's with the very easy alphabet mazes and number mazes that are "trace" puzzle mazes intended to aid letter recognition and exercise writing skills. Older kids will enjoy a wide selection of more difficult mazes. (Including a few that might even challenge their parents!)

180 hand crafted letter mazes, number mazes, shape mazes, geometric mazes, picture mazes and other custom maze puzzles in 6 difficulty levels for kids of every age. An endless supply of random mazes, in 4 difficulty levels.

Kid friendly: Simple, logical gameplay that a toddler can master. A "no reading required" interface.

Attractive rewards, familiar three star unlock and high score system to encourage repeat play and improvement, merit badges, "star pop" mini-game when stars earned. Stars are awarded as an incentive for solving mazes quickly and to encourage repeat play and trace skill improvement, but are not required to progress. Younger kids working on a letter maze or number maze need not achieve stars, while older kids and adults working on a harder maze can challenge themselves to earn the highest reward.

4 themes:

Crayon on paper: default high-contrast daylight

Chalk on blackboard: reversed-contrast nighttime

Pencil on graph paper: reduced-contrast for sensitive eyes

Chalk on greenboard: medium contrast, general purpose

HD graphics for tablets and larger phones.

Two control modes, available simultaneously or individually: "drag" (better for larger devices) and "pull" (better for smaller devices).

No in-app purchases or social media.
